badgeContent.description: The content rendered within the badge.

children.description: The badge will be added relative to this node.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

color.description: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.

component.description:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a DOM element or a component.

invisible.description: If `true`, the badge will be invisible.

overlap.description: Wrapped shape the badge should overlap.

showZero.description: Controls whether the badge is hidden when `badgeContent` is zero.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.badge: Styles applied to the badge `span` element.
descriptions.colorPrimary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="primary"`.
descriptions.colorSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="secondary"`.
descriptions.colorError: Styles applied to the root element if `color="error"`.
descriptions.dot: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="dot"`.
descriptions.anchorOriginTopRightRectangle: Styles applied to the root element if `anchorOrigin={{ 'top', 'right' }} overlap="rectangle"`.
descriptions.anchorOriginBottomRightRectangle: Styles applied to the root element if `anchorOrigin={{ 'bottom', 'right' }} overlap="rectangle"`.
descriptions.anchorOriginTopLeftRectangle: Styles applied to the root element if `anchorOrigin={{ 'top', 'left' }} overlap="rectangle"`.
descriptions.anchorOriginBottomLeftRectangle: Styles applied to the root element if `anchorOrigin={{ 'bottom', 'left' }} overlap="rectangle"`.
descriptions.anchorOriginTopRightCircle: Styles applied to the root element if `anchorOrigin={{ 'top', 'right' }} overlap="circle"`.
descriptions.anchorOriginBottomRightCircle: Styles applied to the root element if `anchorOrigin={{ 'bottom', 'right' }} overlap="circle"`.
descriptions.anchorOriginTopLeftCircle: Styles applied to the root element if `anchorOrigin={{ 'top', 'left' }} overlap="circle"`.
descriptions.anchorOriginBottomLeftCircle: Styles applied to the root element if `anchorOrigin={{ 'bottom', 'left' }} overlap="circle"`.
descriptions.invisible: Pseudo-class to the badge `span` element if `invisible={true}`.
